MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry, affecting properties in Llynclys and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:27pm. Our engineers have arrived on site. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:21pm on 21st April 2021
